Welcome to Project2’s documentation!¶

class clusters.algs.Ligand(id, score, smiles, on_bits)¶

Bases: object

Represents a ligand and stores relevant information yielded from docking.

id¶

Identification number.

Type

int

score¶

AutoDock Vina score.

Type

float

smiles¶

SMILES string.

Type

str

on_bits¶

The “on” bits in the Extended Connectivity Fingerprint.

Type

np.array of ints

bit_string¶

The 1024-length bit string of whether or not each bit is “on”.

Type

np.array of ints

Parameters

  • id (int) – Identification number. Saved as class attribute.

  • score (float) – AutoDock Vina score. Saved as class attribute.

  • smiles (str) – SMILES string. Saved as class attribute.

  • on_bits (np.array of ints) – The “On” bits in the Extended Connectivity Fingerprint. Saved as class attribute.

clusters.algs.load_ligands(ligand_file)¶

Loads ligand information from csv file and creates an array of Ligands.

Parameters

ligand_file (str) – Name of csv file containing information for each ligand.

Returns

ligands – Ligands.

Return type

np.array of Ligands

class clusters.algs.Cluster¶

Bases: object

Represents a cluster by containing an array of ids of the members of the cluster.

members¶

Unique ids associated with each member of the cluster.

Type

np.array of ints

class clusters.algs.HierarchicalClustering(num_clusters)¶

Bases: object

Implements hierarchical clustering for an array of coordinates.

num_clusters¶

Number of clusters.

Type

int

clusters¶

Clusters generated from doing hierarchical clustering.

Type

np.array of Clusters

Parameters

num_clusters (int) – Number of clusters. Saved as a class attribute.

cluster(ids, points)¶

Clusters a set of points using hierarchical clustering.

Parameters

  • ids (np.array of ints) – Id numbers for each point to be clustered.

  • points (np.array of ints) – Points to be clustered (each row is a point and each column is a dimension/feature).

Returns

c – Clusters yielded from hierarchical clustering of points.

Return type

np.array of Clusters

class clusters.algs.PartitionClustering(num_clusters, max_iterations)¶

Bases: object

Implements partition clustering for an array of coordinates.

num_clusters¶

Number of clusters.

Type

int

max_iterations¶

Maximum number of iterations.

Type

int

clusters¶

Clusters generated from doing hierarchical clustering.

Type

np.array of Clusters

Parameters

  • num_clusters (int) – Number of clusters. Saved as a class attribute.

  • max_iterations (int) – Maximum number of iterations. Saved as a class attribute.

cluster(ids, points)¶

Clusters a set of points using partition clustering.

Parameters

  • ids (np.array of ints) – Id numbers for each point to be clustered.

  • points (np.array of ints) – Points to be clustered (each row is a point and each column is a dimension/feature).

Returns

c – Clusters yielded from partition clustering of points.

Return type

np.array of Clusters

clusters.algs.get_cluster_assignments(c)¶

Gets the cluster assignments for points that have already been clustered.

Parameters

c (np.array of Clusters) – Array of Clusters.

Returns

cl_nums – Cluster assignments for each point (each key is a point and each value is its cluster assignment).

Return type

dict
